Notes: A special planet with a model and collision that activates a switch after executing a short cutscene. In order to start the cutscene, another switch needs to be activated first.

SW_A.Description: Gets activated after the blooming cutscene.

SW_B.Description: If activated, it will start the blooming cutscene.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene.
